卢仙娜·帕鲁兹 Luciana Paluzzi

this_title: A Bond for Life: How James Bond Changed My Life
introduction: The non-commercial Fan Documentary 'A Bond for Life' retraces the past 20 years in the life of a James Bond fan - from being exposed to Bond for the first time in 1996 until the world premiere of 'SPECTRE' in 2015. Partly filmed on original Bond locations across Europe, the film takes viewers on a colorful journey through difficult and challenging times of the narrator. Beside Bond experts and fans from across the globe, Special Guest Stars such as film composer David Arnold, actress Nikki van der Zyl, Lyricist and Academy Award Winner Don Black, Production Designer and Academy Award Winner Sir Ken Adam as well as actors Mads Mikkelsen and Götz Otto share their experiences with James Bond. The aim is to deliver an entertaining Fan-Documentary with an important message: That you can achieve a lot when you believe in yourself and learn to stand on your own two feet. Another reason is the possibility, to reach a significant amount of donations for UNICEF on a European level and thereby ...
chinese_title: A Bond for Life: How James Bond Changed My Life
